name: Takoyaki Returns
description:
The "Octopus Tank" is back!  This time instead of fighting off Takoyaki based asteroids, it fights off sea creatures from the depths! Shoot down enemies for points and collect power-ups to increase your chance of survival!  It is a brand new aquatic tank shoot em up game! (The name of the octopus is Takoyaki.)

Developer's Note: Takoyaki Returns is not just an expanded remake of my original game, but it was a challenge to see how far I could push this game to its limits, while keeping it as a small arcade game.

[IMPORTANT: Click on the blue square on the bottom right corner of the game to play in Fullscreen.]

Controls

A/D Left Right: Rotate

W/S Up Down: Move

Spacebar: Shoot

L/R Shift: Drop Mine
